casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

August 20, 2008

[Cite as 08/20/2008 Case Announcements, 2008-Ohio-4183.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2008-1303. Rzepka v. Solon.

Cuyahoga C.P. No. CV08656878. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal of a contest of an election from the Court of Common Pleas of Cuyahoga County. Upon consideration of appellant’s unopposed motion for stay of briefing,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted.
